about_the_game:
SUMMARY

Shadow Of The Abyss is a short playable experience where you play through the eyes of a bodycam. As a security guard, your job is to survey an office building during a night shift, until you fall into the hands of fate.

GAMEPLAY

Work your way through the building, completing the tasks given to you by your shift manager. Inside your security room will be an array of different keys which will unlock specific doors. Use the correct keys on each door to progress through the building and make it through the night, unless something gets you before then!


This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
